title: Study for a Female Nude
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff
provenance_text:
Pierre-Cécile Puvis de Chavannes [1824-1898], Paris, France; the artist's estate [1]. Dr. and Mrs. Daniel Fishkoff, Colonia, NJ, by June 12, 1974 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1976.

Notes:
[1]. Atelier (estate) inventory stamp,  L. 2104, is present on the drawing (recto, lower right.)
[2]. Daniel and Jane Fishkoff loaned the work to the Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute in June 1974; see curatorial file for original loan form and list of works.
